title: No explicit right for users to access personal information or request correction or deletion

tosdr.tldr: The "Right to Access Your Information" paragraph in Netflix's Privacy Policy implies that accessing your information is only available through the "'Your Account' portion of our website." A provision in their Privacy Policy which allowed explicit requests to access, correct, and delete a user's personal information was deleted on 09-14-2012, and replaced with "If you have a question regarding our privacy practices, or want to exercise your rights regarding your personal information, please contact us at pr...@netflix.com"
